statements: SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM HazardousWasteIncidents WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, severity FROM HazardousWasteIncidents ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM HazardousWasteIncidents WHERE location = 'Factory A';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location, description, severity FROM HazardousWasteIncidents WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteIncidents WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY incident_date ASC
SELECT incident_id, location FROM HazardousWasteIncidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY location
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM HazardousWasteIncidents WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY incident_id DESC
SELECT incident_id, location, severity FROM HazardousWasteIncidents WHERE severity IN ('High', 'Medium') ORDER BY location, incident_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM Incidents WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM Incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT description, location FROM Incidents WHERE employee_involved IS NOT NULL;
SELECT incident_id, location, employee_involved FROM Incidents WHERE hazardous_materials_involved = 'Yes';
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE incident_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT incident_id, description, employee_involved FROM Incidents WHERE incident_id = 12345;
SELECT accident_id, location, severity FROM Accidents WHERE location LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT * FROM Incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT description, location, investigation_status FROM Accidents WHERE severity >= 3 AND investigation_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT id, location, severity FROM incidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT location, description FROM incidents WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, location, cause FROM accidents ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, type, quantity FROM waste_disposal WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM accidents GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, location, damage FROM accidents WHERE damage BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE type = 'Hazardous Waste' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, location, date FROM incidents WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Incidents;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM Incidents;
SELECT location, date FROM Incidents;
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM Incidents WHERE location = 'City Hall';
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE incident_id = 100;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM Incidents WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT incident_id, location FROM Incidents WHERE description LIKE '%theft%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM Incidents;
SELECT * FROM Incidents;
SELECT location, date FROM Accidents ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT material_name, hazardous_level FROM HazardousMaterials WHERE hazardous_level > 3;
SELECT name, department FROM Investigators WHERE department = 'Safety';
SELECT description FROM PreventionMeasures WHERE recommended_action IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, date FROM Accidents WHERE description LIKE '%collision%' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT material_name, hazardous_level FROM HazardousMaterials ORDER BY hazardous_level DESC;
SELECT investigator_id, name, department FROM Investigators WHERE department = 'Safety' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PreventionMeasures WHERE recommended_action IS NOT NULL ORDER BY measure_id;
